event.title: The Odin Project #2
event.description:
Holding place for the next event. More info to come...

For now, target is to have worked through the Javascript & jQuery intro section in the following two areas of the Curriculum...

Web Development 101 >> The Front End >> 3. Javascript Basics
Web Development 101 >> The Front End >> 4. jQuery Basics

Have a go at the JS & jQ project before the event, as we'll be talking around this.
